price: Ɔkra biara bεka owuo ahwε, na afei Yεn hͻ na mobεsan aba.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kullu nafsin dhāiqatu al-mawti thumma ilaynā tur'jaʿūna
